name: Hand felted glasses case
description:
Hand wet-felted glasses case made from soft Australian merino wool, mulberry silk tops, then embellished with needle felted wool, silk and silk ribbons, and finished with glass, freshwater pearls and semi precious beads.  Glasses case fastens at the back with a plaited red silk thread loop around a purple heart-shaped button.

In order to attain a thick, durable material that will withstand daily handling, the wool was carefully worked until it shrank to 50% of its original layout size.  

Glasses case measures approximately 190x95mm (7.5"x3.5") and will easily take up to a large pair of glasses or sunglasses.  

While this case has been sold, I am always happy to accept commissions.  Please contact me with desired colour/colour blends.

name: Lightweight nuno felt scarf
description:
Lightweight, luxurious nuno felt scarf made of silk chiffon hand felted with softest Merino wool and mulberry silk tops, finished with glass and semi-precious beads nestled in the ruched wool and silk.  Scarf has one side felted to the edge, while the other side has a narrow silk chiffon ruched edge.

Approximate size of each scarf (slight differences due to nature of the felting process) is 135x11cm (53.2"x4.3") with ends tapering gently to a soft point.

Scarf comes in various colour mixes and I am also happy to work to commission using colour/colour blends of your choice.

options.name: Navy/black chiffon with navy, black, purple, kelly green
Cream chiffon with wattle, yellow, orange, kelly green
Dusky rose chiffon with maroon, dusky rose, mocca
Blue grey chiffon with winter white, grey, turquoise, black
